DOC.brief_summary: Acute Myocardial Infarction ( MI ) still lead cause death western world . Early warning ( chest pain ) sign acute MI often misinterpret disregarded . In average take 2-3 hour begin chest pain . The damage heart 2 hour critical often irreversible . Thus early warning test device highly warrant . Corsens develop noninvasive device use several sensor apply chest detection system able recognize ischemic origin chest pain . This clinical study intend evaluate safety efficacy Corsens technology use myocardial infarction detection
